name: Europacable
membership:
Co-operating Partner of Cenelec
Associate Partner of the Fibre to the Home Council Europe
goal:
Founded in 1991, Europacable is the voice of all leading European wire and cable producers. Europacable members include the largest cable makers in the world providing global technology leadership, as well as highly specialized small- and medium sized businesses from across Europe.
Globally our members employ over 70.000 people of which more than 50% in Europe, generating a turnover over € 22 billion in 2016. The product scope of our members covers the full range of energy, communication, industrial and special application cables.
Europacable is listed in the European Commission’s transparency register under 453103789-92. We are a partner of CENELEC.
interests: Communication, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Europacable follows EU Energy-, Telecommunications-, Industry- and Environmental- policies relevant to its members.
